metadata.synopsis: The player finds a dead tiefling near the refugee's abandoned caravan. The tiefling was killed by the shadowcursed ox. The player rolls a Medicine check to determine the tiefling's death

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Gored to death, by the look of it.
0.context: NodeContext: Commenting on a tiefling who was gored to death

1.speaker: Player
1.context: NodeContext: Commenting on a dead tiefling (gored to death, but they have failed to notice this)
